description:
Not sure if Vicente is in the medical field or not. It sounded like he really wasn't into doing the peep video for the money, that things were fine on that front, more that he was into showing-off or just doing porn for fun.
Based on his peep video, he was clearly into putting on a show for us. He has a hot body with nicely trimmed hair. He has a great uncut cock, while his ass is clearly in the "bubble-butt" category.
Thankfully he gives us some really nice ass play that leaves me (and you all) wondering if this guy really would love to bottom some day!
He left on a business trip just after this shoot, so I have not had a chance to talk to him about doing more. I do know he said he was straight, but he would be down for "whatever" if the money was right. So maybe the money was part of it after all!
We shall see!
title: Vicente - peep
